#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
long long mult(long long a[],long long N)
{
	long long i,RESULT=1;
	for(i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
	RESULT=(RESULT%1000000007)*(a[i]%1000000007);		//*a is the first element only, u need all in the array
	RESULT=RESULT%1000000007;
	
		}
	return RESULT;	
}
int main()
{
	long long a[101],T,N,i,j,r;	
	scanf("%lld",&T);
	for(j=0;j<T;j++)	//U used i here also inside the for loop. As a result, the value of i kept changing
	{
		scanf("%lld",&N);
		
		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
			a[i]=a[i]%1000000007;
		}
		r=mult(a,N);
		printf("%lld\n",r);	//U always forget \n at the end of the anser. U must follow exact pattern given in the problem
		}
	//getch();
}
